body.bibl: Audo, Antoine. “Syriac Identity in Ecumenical Context – Middle East and Diaspora Different Pastoral Experiences and Pastoral Agreements.” In Identity and Witness: Syriac Christians of the Middle East and India between Homeland and Global Presence, edited by Dietmar W. Winkler and Andreas Schmoller, 81–106. Pro Oriente Studies in the Syriac Tradition 5. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2023.
